list.name: Container end events
list.query: event_type:STATE_EVENT AND state:END AND application_id:$application_id AND container_id:$container_id AND framework:$framework AND component:$component

panels.content:
Below graphs are displayed per pid as some jobs are running multiple JVM inside the same container

You can use the pid variable to display metrics for only one JVM

list.name: container_id
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "container_id", "query": "username:$username  AND framework:$framework AND application_id:$application_id AND component:$component"}

list.name: hostname
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "hostname", "query": "username:$username AND framework:$framework AND application_id:$application_id AND component:$component AND container_id:$container_id"}

list.name: uri
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "uri", "query": "username:$username AND framework:$framework AND application_id:$application_id AND component:$component AND container_id:$container_id"}
